div.class: thumbnail wow animated wow animated pulse

img.alt: Hempstead ISD Remains Closed Through End of School Year

div.h3: Hempstead ISD Remains Closed Through End of School Year
div.div: In accordance with the governor’s orders, Hempstead ISD (HISD) has extended the suspension of normal operations and will remain closed through the end of the school year. . . .

a.aria-label: Full Article For Hempstead ISD Remains Closed Through End of School Year
Source Information For Hempstead ISD Remains Closed Through End of School Year

div.class: thumbnail wow animated wow animated pulse

img.alt: Free Mobile & Curbside Meals 18 yrs & Below - Update Information

div.h3: Free Mobile & Curbside Meals 18 yrs & Below - Update Information
div.div: Free mobile and curbside meals for 18 yrs and younger will continue. Starting Monday, April 13, meals will only be served on Mondays & Wednesdays. (2 on Mondays & 3 on Wednesdays curbside too) . . .

a.aria-label: Full Article For Free Mobile & Curbside Meals 18 yrs & Below - Update Information
Source Information For Free Mobile & Curbside Meals 18 yrs & Below - Update Information

div.h4: Mark your calendar... Census Day April 1, 2020
Count Everyone who lives in your home in the 2020 Census.
Everyone needs to be counted to ensure our community gets the resources we need.
Remind someone to count YOU and everyone who lives in your home, even newborn babies!
Help our Schools & Community... Complete the 2020 US Census.

a.aria-label: Previous Announcement
Next Announcement

div.class: col-md-12 thumbnail wow animated wow animated pulse

img.alt: Hempstead ISD Board of Trustees Election Postponed to November

div.h3: Hempstead ISD Board of Trustees Election Postponed to November
div.div: Due to the COVID-19 Pandemic, the Hempstead ISD School Board Trustee Election scheduled for May 2, 2020 has been postponed to November 3, 2020. . . .

a.aria-label: Full Article For Hempstead ISD Board of Trustees Election Postponed to November
Source Information For Hempstead ISD Board of Trustees Election Postponed to November

div.class: col-md-12 thumbnail wow animated wow animated pulse

img.alt: Health & Welfare of our Hempstead ISD Family

div.h3: Health & Welfare of our Hempstead ISD Family
div.div: The health and welfare of our students, staff and community is very important. We are currently monitoring the COVID-19. We take every precaution to control the spread of germs in our schools daily. . . .

a.aria-label: Full Article For Health & Welfare of our Hempstead ISD Family
Source Information For Health & Welfare of our Hempstead ISD Family

img.alt: HHS Hosts Informational Vaping Presentation for Students

div.h3: HHS Hosts Informational Vaping Presentation for Students
div.div: In an effort to inform students at HHS of the dangers associated with vaping, Principal Mullens brought in TDSHS Regional Tobacco Coordinator to speak to the students. . . .
